sentences.sContent: You know I look at something like this and I think, ooh the future of this will be that our planes could be solar-powered, still pay 40 dollars to check a bag.
sentences.sContent_eng: You know I look at something like this and I think, ooh the future of this will be that our planes could be solar-powered, still pay 40 dollars to check a bag.
sentences.sCn: 知道吗，当我看到它时，我就想，喔，将来的飞机就都可以用太阳能提供动力了，最好呢，就是机票还是40美元。
